text: قال يابليس ما لك الا تكون مع السجدين

translations.translation: He said, 'Iblis, what is it that prevents you being among the prostrators?'
How is it, O Iblis," said (the Lord), "you did not join those who bowed in homage?"
The Lord inquired: "Iblis! What is the matter with you that you did not join those who prostrated?"
God asked Iblis, "What made you not join the others in prostration?"
Said Allah, “O Iblis! What happened to you that you stayed apart from those who prostrated?”
(Allah) said: "O Iblis! What is your reason for not being among the prostrate"
He said: O Iblis! what excuse have you that you are not with those who make obeisance?
Said He, 'What ails thee, Iblis, that thou art not among those bowing?'
He said: O Iblis! What aileth thee that thou art not among the prostrate?
God asked him, "What is the matter with you, that you are not among those who have prostrated themselves?"
Allah said: O Iblis! what aileth thou that thou art not with the prostrates?
He said, ‘O Iblis! What kept you from being among those who have prostrated?’
(Allah) said: "O Iblis! what is your reason for not being among those who prostrated themselves?"
(Allah) said: "O Iblis (Satan)! What is your reason for not being among the prostrators?"
He said: 'iblis, what is the matter with you, that you do you not prostrate yourself'
He said, “O Satan, what kept you from being among those who prostrated themselves?”
[Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
[15:32] He, [God] exalted be He: ‘O Iblīs what is wrong with you, what prevents you, that you are not among those prostrating?’

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: وجملة { ما لك ألا تكون مع الساجدين } استفهام توبيخ . ومعناه أي شيء ثبت لك ، أي متمكناً منك ، لأن اللام تفيد الملك . و { ألا تكون } معمول لحرف جر محذوف تقديره ( في ). وحَذف حرف الجر مطرد مع ( أنْ ). وحرف ( أن ) يفيد المصدرية . فالتقدير في انتفاء كونك من الساجدين .

translations.translation: (He) Allah, Exalted is He, (said: O Iblis!) O you who have despaired of My mercy, (What aileth you that thou art not among the prostrate?) why do you not prostrate to Adam?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وركن عن أمر الله { قَالَ } سبحانه توبيخاً وتقريعاً: { يٰإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ } أي: أي: شيء عرض لك يا إبليس { أَلاَّ تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّاجِدِينَ } [الحجر: 32] الخاضعين الواضعين جباههم على تراب المذلة امتثالاً للأمر الوجوبي؟!


{ قَالَ } إبليس محتجاً على الله
